snippet.title: Elderly pedestrian hit and killed in NSW
snippet.content: A 46-year-old driver has been charged with dangerous driving causing death after an elderly man was hit and killed in Sydney's inner west. The 83-year-old man died in hospital after he was struck by a van in Enfield on Thursday morning. The driver was charged with dangerous driving occasioning death and negligent driving occasioning death, NSW Police said in a statement on Friday. He's due to face Burwood Local Court on August 28. (C) AAP 2017
